SEARCH
Module org.opengis.geoapi
Package org.opengis.metadata.citation

Interface Individual

All Superinterfaces:
Party
@UML(identifier="CI_Individual", specification=ISO_19115) public interface Individual extends Party
Information about the party if the party is an individual.

Conditional properties:

Following property has default method but shall nevertheless be implemented if the corresponding condition is met:
  • Position name is mandatory if the name (in parent interface) is not documented.
Since:
3.1

    default InternationalString
    getPositionName()
    Position of the individual in an organisation.

  • Method Details

    • getPositionName

      @UML(identifier="positionName", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115) default InternationalString getPositionName()
      Position of the individual in an organisation.
      Returns:
      position of the individual in an organisation, or null if none.
      Condition:
      Mandatory if name is not documented.
